name: Idol Janshi Suchie-Pai Mecha Genteiban: Hatsubai 5 Shuunen Toku Package
overview: Idol Janshi Suchie-Pai Mecha Genteiban: Hatsubai 5 Shuunen (Toku) Package (アイドル雀士スーチーパイ めちゃ限定版 発売５周年(得)パッケージ) is a fifth anniversary-themed compilation of Suchie-Pai games released by Jaleco for the Sega Saturn.
